title: Pokémon Leaks! Sonic Open World!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.09.21
description:
Blessing and Gary talk about Pokemon Brilliant Diamond and Shining Pearl leaks, Sonic Frontiers leaks, the next 3D Mario game and a cool looking game called Lies of P.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:12:00 - Housekeeping

PS I Love You XOXO is up right now! It’s Janet and I going through and creating our definitive PlayStation Holiday Shopping guide. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack

The Roper Report -
00:20:44 - Pokémon Brilliant Diamond And Shining Pearl Leak Early
00:31:23 - Ads
00:35:43 - Is the next Sonic game open world??
00:42:48 - Miyamoto wants the next 3D Mario game to ‘further expand’ the series
00:52:19 - Deathloop’s director has been appointed as the new head of Arkane Lyon
00:53:26 - The Tomorrow Children is making a return
00:58:23 - Lies of P looks like Pinocchio meets Bloodborne
01:00:52 - Out today
01:01:33 - NVIDIA GeForce Update
01:02:38 - Squad Up: Adam F - Xbox/Forza - Wats0n001 
01:03:18 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim and Andy
